channel.title: Getting started on Spring Boot OAuth 2.0 & OpenID Connect Authorization Server
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on Spring Boot OAuth 2.0 & OpenID Connect Authorization Server

item.title: Installation
item.description: Installing the authorization server is easy. Just follow the instructions in the next sections. System Requirements To run the server you need at least a Java 11 JDK or higher (versions 11 and 14 are currently tested). Build and Run the Authorization Server To build the authorization server yourself just get the latest sources from master branch in the corresponding github repository. To build the server perform a gradlew build command.
